segments.text: Daniel , you can't spit the gum everywhere .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on , just a little piece .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know how many people chew gum everyday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just in Beijing , people consume 300,000 pieces of gum every day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If all the people spit out the gum like you , the whole world would become a big trash can .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on , you are making too big deal out of this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just want to remind you to behave yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , dear sister , I see . This kind of thing will not happen again .
segments.speaker: S2
